message: I like Kanye West, Broken Social Scene, Radiohead, Beck...
I need some new music, what are you listening to?
@theschnaz do you want new music to you or new music period?
and let's be honest, wouldn't you rather a topic that focuses on the noteworthy new music, rather than all new music? I mean.... it's got a musical pun baked into the name!
@jacob either, i'm just looking for good tunes
there's already a nice list of stuff in "new music of note"
I've found quite few new music in all genres from playing http://thirdstyle.com/play
I'm pretty sure this is the best way to promote a song initially.  This is a pretty good solution to that, although it doesn't seem to be a marketing tool.
That's probably why Cee-Lo made it big with its initial type art that went viral.
I've been interested in the prospect of introducing people to music through undivided attention to the tune.
@fridrik I agree. But I don't think thirdstyle has figured that out yet. There is very little info about these artists. Not even a link. I was hoping for an artist profile
